title: London's Summer Morning - characterization of city

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Robinson uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex characterization of the city as a source of inspiration for the poet.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Robinson uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex characterization of the city as a source of inspiration for the poet.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
